user

The list of all users. Users are global - that is, independent of any particular account.

Attribute Comment Format Attributes
uid  The unique key.  uid
max length: 30
allows( printable ) 		pk
required
 
name  The user name, we typically default this to the username portion of the user's email address.  name
max length: 30
allows( printable ) 		required
 
email  The email is effectively the user identity.  email
max length: 50
allows( printable ) 		required
 
verified  Indicates if this user's email address has been verified. We require the email address to be verified before the user is allowed to log in.  boolean required
 
passwordSalt  The salt used for this user. Each user has a different salt. The salt is set to a random value when the user is created, and should never be changed.  uid
max length: 30
allows( printable ) 		required
 
passwordHash  The password sha hash used to authenticate the user. The actual password is not stored. If the user has no password the hash is set to empty string.  shaHash
max length: 40
allows( printable ) 		 
timeZoneCode  The time zone.  timeZoneCode
max length: 5
allows( printable ) 		 
roleCode  The role, or access level.  letterCode
max length: 1
allows( letters ) 		required
 
lockVersion  Used for optimistic locking.  lockVersion  
roleName  ${field.f_comment}  name
max length: 30
allows( printable )
